text: Tyā striyānvara kasalāhī gunhā nāhī tyā āpalyā pityān̄cyā, āpalyā putrān̄cyā āṇi bhāvān̄cyā, āpalyā putaṇyān̄cyā, bhācyān̄cyā āṇi āpalyā (paricita) striyān̄cyā āṇi jyān̄cyā tyā mālaka āhēta tyāṁ (dāsa dāsīṁ) cyā samōra asāvyāta.1 Striyānnō! Allāhacē bhaya bāḷagata rāhā, allāha niḥsanśaya, pratyēka gōṣṭīvara sākṣī āhē
